meanings.sent1: The loud noise outside the window uproused the sleeping dog.
meanings.sent2: She uproused her friends to join her in the adventure.
meanings.sent3: The smell of freshly baked cookies uproused memories of childhood.
meanings.sent4: His speech uproused a sense of patriotism in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise uproused the city to start a new day.

meanings.sent1: The uprousing music got everyone on their feet dancing.
meanings.sent2: The uprousing news spread quickly throughout the town.
meanings.sent3: The uprousing movie kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: The uprousing game had fans cheering until the very end.
meanings.sent5: The uprousing performance left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: The act of rousing or awakening
meanings.sent1: The uprousing of the city at dawn was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: His uprousing of the team before the match boosted their morale.
meanings.sent3: The uprousing of the bear from hibernation was captured on camera.
meanings.sent4: The uprousing of the audience with his speech was remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The uprousing of the flowers in spring brought color to the garden.
